mapper.select: select r.board_no, r.mem_no, m.nick, r.rate, r.rev_desct, r.wrt_date, r.img from review r left join member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
select 'REV' || LPAD(rev_seq.nextval, 6, '0') from dual
insert into review(REV_NO, MEM_NO, RATE, REV_DESCT, WRT_DATE, BOARD_NO) values(#{revNo}, #{memNo}, #{rate}, #{revDesct}, sysdate, #{boardNo})
